TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供在設計階段用於評估和編輯資源運算式的屬性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing a resource expression at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並提供用於評估和資源的參考關聯的控制項屬性，在設計階段實作。The class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource reference with a control property at design time. 例如，將控制項屬性的值繫結至資源運算式`Resources:submitText`，表示控制項屬性值使用指定的資源設定`submitText`。For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the resource expression `Resources:submitText`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the resource named `submitText`. 視覺化設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用類別來指定資源類別、 金鑰和資源運算式，設計工具的預設值，然後選取的資源為評估運算式設計階段呈現。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to specify a resource class, key, and designer default value for a resource expression, and then evaluate the selected resource expression for design-time rendering. 當您瀏覽屬性在設計階段屬性方格控制項的視覺化設計工具會顯示一個對話方塊來提供執行階段值的控制項屬性的集合運算式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property. 您可以選取清單運算式前置字元為基礎的運算式型別。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 當您選取**資源**運算式前置字元，在清單中，視覺化設計工具會使用方法來設定，評估及轉換資源運算式語法為基礎的運算式。When you select the **Resources** expression prefix in the list, the visual designer uses the methods to set, evaluate, and convert the expression based on the resource expression syntax. 視覺化設計工具可用於評估的運算式結果指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 基底屬性傳回字串`Resources`。The base property for a returns the string `Resources`. 類別是運算式前置詞相關聯`Resources`和實作。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法評估輸入的資源運算式。The method evaluates an input resource expression. 方法會傳回實作，可用來選取資源名稱、 類別和設計預設值，並以形成資源運算式從選取的資源值。The method returns the implementation that is used to select the resource name, class, and designer default value, and to form a resource expression from the selected resource values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結屬性控制項來使用資源運算式類別。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to a resource expression using the class. 1. 在 Web Form 專案中，加入名為 Strings.resx App_LocalResources 目錄到新的資源檔。In a Web Forms project, add a new resource file named Strings.resx to the App_LocalResources directory. 2. 加入名為 myLinkText Strings.resx 資源檔中，字串，然後將值設為文字控制項。Add a string named myLinkText to the Strings.resx resource file, and then set the value to the text for a control. 例如，設定`myLinkText`字串到值`This is a good link`。For example, set the `myLinkText` string value to `This is a good link`. 3. 在 Web Form 頁面中，加入控制項。In a Web Forms page, add a control. 4. 如`Hyperlink`控制項，在內容中，按一下**運算式**，然後按一下省略符號按鈕 (**...**).For the `Hyperlink` control, in Properties, click **Expressions**, and then click the ellipsis button (**...**). ``**運算式** 對話方塊隨即出現。The ``**Expressions** dialog box appears. 5. 在下**可繫結屬性**，按一下 **文字**，然後在**運算式型別**清單中，輸入**資源**。Under **Bindable properties**, click **Text**, and then in the **Expression type** list, enter **Resources**. 資源運算式屬性所定義的類別會出現。The resource expression properties that are defined by the class appear. 6. 在下**運算式內容**設定**ClassName**至**字串**，這是編譯 Strings.resx 資源檔和設定的類別名稱**ResourceKey**至**myLinkText**，這是在 Strings.resx 的字串名稱。Under **Expression Properties** set **ClassName** to **Strings**, which is the class name for the compiled Strings.resx resource file and set **ResourceKey** to **myLinkText**, which is the string name in Strings.resx. 視覺化設計工具使用指派資源運算式`Text`屬性。The visual designer uses the to assign the resource expression for the `Text` property. 下列的.aspx 來源顯示所使用的資源運算式設定屬性值的範例。The following .aspx source shows an example of a property value that is set by using a resource expression. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#3)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件由基底類別，連同設定屬性設定為`Resources`。A object is configured by the base class together with an property set to `Resources`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: expression 不包含 運算式前置字元。

span.span: expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 提供其他剖析資料的物件，以 值的形式表示。

span.span: An object supplying additional parse data, in the form of a value.
The type of the control property.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 評估資源運算式，並提供控制項屬性的設計階段值。

span.span: Evaluates a resource expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 運算式評估成功時，評估的運算式字串所參考的物件，否則為 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢所指定的資源`expression`，然後傳回該資源。The method looks up the resource that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the resource. 視覺化設計工具使用方法，以評估資源運算式，並提供設計階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate a resource expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 在執行階段，頁面剖析器會使用和方法對應實作，以評估運算式，並提供執行階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property. 視覺化設計工具使用方法來剖析的運算式字串在設計階段，然後呼叫剖析的運算式資料的方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 資源運算式，用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: A resource expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作是由設計工具主應用程式提供，可以用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

summary.span: 傳回資源運算式編輯器工作表，此工作表會使用輸入的運算式字串和服務提供者實作初始化。

span.span: Returns a resource expression editor sheet that is initialized with the input expression string and service provider implementation.

returns.span: 定義資源運算式屬性的 。

span.span: A that defines the resource expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的運算式編輯器資源運算式的工作表實作。The method returns an expression editor sheet implementation for resource expressions. 視覺化設計工具主應用程式使用運算式 對話方塊中的運算式編輯器工作表。The visual designer host uses the expression editor sheet in its expressions dialog box.
